snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic lost for the first time this season, beaten by Andy Murray, 6-2, 7-5, in the semifinals of the Dubai Championships on Friday.
abstract: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic loses for the first time this season, beaten by Andy Murray in the men's semifinals of the Dubai Championships tennis tournament.
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic lost for the first time this season, beaten by Andy Murray, 6-2, 7-5, in the semifinals of the Dubai Championships on Friday.
